text: The 1912–13 South Carolina Gamecocks men's basketball team represents University of South Carolina during the 1912–13 NCAA men's basketball season. The head coach was James G. Driver coaching the Gamecocks in his second season. ==Schedule== ==References== Category:South Carolina Gamecocks men's basketball seasons South Carolina South Carol South Carol
title: 1912–13 South Carolina Gamecocks men's basketball team
